example.text: As a result of alternate splicing and subsequent frameshift, the reported g16 protein is 603 amino acids shorter than the NY-LU-12 product (1123 residues) at its COOH terminus and would therefore lack the epitopes recognized by the autologous serum.

example.text: These mutations, identified by standard methods of reverse transcription, PCR,dideoxy-chain termination, and cycle sequencing, alter highly conserved sequences at intron/exon boundaries and prevent the RNA-splicing apparatus from properly recognizing the normal splice junction.

example.text: Blots were probed with affinity-purified polyclonal anti-LMP-1 antiserum that recognizes epitopes in the C-terminus of LMP-1 at a 1:200 dilution.
example.arg: epitopes in the C-terminus of LMP-1 at a 1:200 dilution

example.text: Blots were probed with a RAT monoclonal anti-HA antibody (Boehringer-Ingelheim) that recognizes the sequence(YPYDVPDYA) at a 1:500 dilution.

Blots were probed with rabbit polyclonal anti-CD40 antiserum that recognizes the C-terminus of CD40 at a 1:500 dilution, or with rabbit polyclonal anti-GFP or anti-RFP (Clontech) antiserum at a 1:250 dilution.
example.arg: C-terminus of CD40 at a 1:500 dilution
